_header: This ender day / As I went to play
_description: In the manner of a chanson d’aventure — 32 lines in eight rhymed quatrains

Cushwa-Leighton.First Lines: This enderes dayAs I went to play…
Cushwa-Leighton.Last Lines:
…As cristall cleneAnd so I meneto tell you
                    trewe
Cushwa-Leighton.Editions:
Berkhout,  Carl T.,
                        ed.  
             “‘Another Late Middle English Lyric.” 
             Notes and Queries
         n. s. 53 (2006): 25-6.
